word: Suppose that you let your light shine, and through your devotion to the cause of God, a few others are led to consecrate their service to Him; then they will be a blessing to still others that you could not reach by your personal influence. The Lord says, "I will make . . . the places round about . . . a blessing." Your light is to be far-reaching.--Ibid., Feb. 10, 1890.
